title: Principles of Theory
description: Advanced exploration of theory covering current research and industry practices.

title: Principles of Seminar
description: Advanced exploration of seminar covering current research and industry practices.

title: Intermediate Theory
description: Interdisciplinary approach to theory combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.

title: Intermediate Theory
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in theory. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Workshop
description: Comprehensive study of workshop with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Research
description: In-depth analysis of research principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Advanced Analysis
description: Comprehensive study of analysis with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Graduate Research
description: Interdisciplinary approach to research combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
prerequisites: LIBS 363 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Research
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in research. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.
prerequisites: LIBS 383 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Workshop
description: Rigorous treatment of workshop theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.
prerequisites: LIBS 329 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Applications
description: Advanced exploration of applications covering current research and industry practices.
prerequisites: LIBS 301 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Practice
description: Comprehensive study of practice with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: LIBS 398 and senior standing or graduate status
